insights.title: Ghost Disappearances
insights.description: Products with high inventory loss (>10 units) but zero recorded sales.
n8n_questions: Identify products that have high inventory loss but zero sales recorded.
Which items are disappearing from stock without generating any revenue?
List top 10 'Ghost' items by quantity lost.

insights.title: High Loss Rate
insights.description: Products where Shrinkage Quantity is greater than 50% of the Starting Inventory.
n8n_questions: Which products have varying loss rates greater than 50%?
Show me items where we lost more than half of the starting inventory.
Rank locations by the percentage of inventory lost.

insights.title: Top Absolute Losers
insights.description: Items with the highest total quantity lost, regardless of sales volume.

Which location has the highest total shrinkage quantity?

insights.title: Financial Risk Summary
insights.description: Products where estimated shrinkage value exceeds $100 or represents a high cost to the business.
n8n_questions: What is the total estimated value of inventory lost across the top 10 products?

Identify items where the loss value is greater than the total sales value.

insights.title: Unexpected Gains (Negative Shrink)
insights.description: Items showing negative shrinkage (End > Start - Sales), implying restock errors or audit inaccuracies.
